notes: Added src/types/declarations.d.ts to declare missing modules and `process`.
Updated tsconfig.json: skipLibCheck=true, types=node, esModuleInterop=true, outDir=dist, rootDir=src.
Replaced several implicit-any function parameters (req, res, _) with explicit ': any' annotations to silence TS7006 errors.
Added recommended devDependencies entries to package.json (these are suggestions only — npm install is required locally).
Created a new zip at /mnt/data/2-backend-fixed.zip for you to download.
